      Methods in algorithm that return Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Chromosome Breed.mutation(Chromosome chromosome)
      Performs the mutation operation on the parent chromosomes and returns a pair of mutated child chromosomes.
      Chromosome Selection.next()
      The iterator method which uses roulette wheel selection to get the next chromosome to be used for the genetic algorithm.
      static Chromosome Pivot.rotate(Chromosome chromosome)
      Rotate the coordinates of the eight queens stored in the chromosome by 90 degrees and return a new chromosome of the transposition.
      Methods in algorithm that return types with arguments of type Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.HashMap<Chromosome,java.lang.Double> Fitness.calculate(java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> chromosomes)
      Applies the fitness function and calculates the fitness of each chromosome in the population.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> Breed.cloning(Selection selection)
      Performs the cloning operation which simply returns the pair of parent chromosomes, these parents continue on to the next generation.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> Breed.crossover(Selection selection)
      Performs the crossover operation on the parent chromosomes and returns a pair of chromosomes.
      Methods in algorithm with parameters of type Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static int Fitness.calcCollisions(Chromosome chromosome)
      Takes a chromosome and returns the number of collisions that occurred.
      static Chromosome Breed.mutation(Chromosome chromosome)
      Performs the mutation operation on the parent chromosomes and returns a pair of mutated child chromosomes.
      static Chromosome Pivot.rotate(Chromosome chromosome)
      Rotate the coordinates of the eight queens stored in the chromosome by 90 degrees and return a new chromosome of the transposition.
      static boolean EightQueens.uniqueSolution(Chromosome chromosome)
      Determines if the solution to the eight queens puzzle is unique if so returns true.
      Method parameters in algorithm with type arguments of type Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.HashMap<Chromosome,java.lang.Double> Fitness.calculate(java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> chromosomes)
      Applies the fitness function and calculates the fitness of each chromosome in the population.
      void Selection.init(java.util.HashMap<Chromosome,java.lang.Double> fitness)
      Initialize the selection iterator with the fitness distribution of the chromosomes which is used to generate the selection range of chromosomes for the roulette wheel selection method.
      static java.lang.Double EightQueens.similarChromosomes(java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> chromosomes)
      Calculates the percentage of chromosomes that are similar, this is an indication about how much in-breeding has occurred.
